page.title: 07 Plessey Radar
page.content: On Monday 15th July Simon, Noel, Lynden and I went to Plessey Radar, in West Cowes. My dad took us in the car. First we had to go to the security box and put our names down in a book, and they gave us a sticker. The sticker said, "Visiting Mr Dobbs". When we got to his office Lynden and Simon asked him some questions and then we asked him ours. Here are our questions: 1). Which Radar did they make first? {AR 1 Radar} 2). How many people do you employ? {1250} 3). How many Radars have you had? { 70} 4). How much do they cost to run? {about Â£3 million}
